column5: LHFC arranged for the presentation in the Underwood Community Center  The public was invited to a "State of Lake Huron" report that was presented by the Upper Great Lakes Management Unit from the Ontario Ministry of Natural Resources.  Information recently presented at the annual Great Lakes Fishery Commission meetings was presented explaining the changing ecological conditions in Lake Huron. Learn about the present state of our fisheries and their possible future.  I took the Video camera & asked if they mind if I Recorded the Presentation, everything went good but my Battery died just before the Q&A at the end, there is 6 parts for over an hour of video  Tight Lines Richard    Presentation Video
